DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label , active-control , multicenter trial compare two oxaliplatin/Avastin-based treatment sequence first-line therapy metastatic colorectal cancer . The study design compare efficacy two treatment sequence respect progression free survival ( PFS ) overall survival .
